text: @GOPLeader So this is what you are concerned with Kremlin Kevin??? People are dying from your inexcusable bungling of addressing the COVID19 pandemic by 1000’s & you’re concerned with confederate statues that stand for the things we Americans don’t???! Unconscionable.
